hero.subtitle: Submit your writing. Receive a living webpage where every scroll reveals your narrative through generated imagery and motion.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Text: Paste your text — a short story, a poem, a memoir fragment. Any narrative works. We'll handle the rest.
howItWorks.step2Text: Your text is broken into scenes. Each scene becomes a visual moment — generated imagery that flows as you scroll. No stock photos. No templates. Made for your words.
howItWorks.step3Text: Within 24 hours, we send you a unique URL. Your story, now a scroll-driven experience you can share anywhere.

form.title: Ready to flow?
form.subtitle: Submit your story below. You'll be directed to payment, then receive your live page within 24 hours.
